data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kononenko, Vladimir, Behounek, Gottfried (2009): A revision of the genus Lophomilia Warren, 1913 with description of four new species from East Asia (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae: Hypeninae). Zootaxa 1989: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274658
